chunk_text:
Happy Building Coder Birthday!

The first Building Coder post was published one year ago, on August 22nd 2008. We celebrated an intermediate birthday with the hundredth post in February 2009. Today is the first real annual birthday and The Building Coder has now reached the ripe old age of one.

I am celebrating with a nice cup of cappuccino. I actually add a drop of cream to mine. To further celebrate, I will say no more after 207 posts so far.
